channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment Datatype Description At times,such as when attaching files to tickets, it is necessary to send files to SoftLayer API methods. The SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Attachment data type models a single file to upload to the API. Local data The contents of a file that is uploaded to the SoftLayer API. Type: binary data filename The name of a file that is uploaded to the SoftLayer API.
